p: The overall RVFV antibody prevalence in the Union of Comoros study zones in 2011 was 27.6% (n = 275, 95% CI, [22.3–32.9]). We found a significant difference of RVFV antibody prevalence between islands (Fisher exact test, p = 0.007), with a higher RVFV antibody prevalence in Moheli (45.8%, 95% CI, [33.7–57.9], Table 3).
